entry.title: RT ropats16 (🧱, 🚀) ᵍᵐ: Want to understand @ArweaveEco’s current mining mechanism? Here’s a super simple explanation 👇 https://twitter.com...
entry.summary:
RT ropats16 (🧱, 🚀) ᵍᵐ Want to understand @ArweaveEco’s current mining mechanism? Here’s a super simple explanation 👇 https://twitter.com/CommunityLabs/status/1674138791647531008
Community Labs | we're hiring!: @ArweaveEco is a global network storing information. However, the network participants (nodes/ miners) must first verify and reach a consensus on the information to be stored. Sometimes referred to as a “mining mechanism”, this thread dives into how this process works 👇 1/15 https://t.co/LVeJgMTiXr
